page.title: 05 LAW AND ORDER
page.content: On our visit to Billesley Police Station we found out about the crime in our area. The crime rate was not very high. The police in our area use Panda and Zulu cars. Until September 1984 they had three horses but now they have none. The police station is an old house converted into a station. One of the worst crimes is drug taking and it is on the increase. Something else that is on the increase is glue sniffing, although it is not illegal there are lots of children under the agew of sixteen who glue sniff and this is very difficult to stop. The police have a very difficult job especially as they get 10 false calls on average each day which wastes a lot of time. They also get about 100 real calls a day. Billesley Police Station do a very good job and catch around 33% of the criminals.
